snippet: Since June 2010, the Metropolitan Transportation Authority has given more than 250,000 Subway Delay Verification notes to passengers to excuse their tardiness.
abstract: Metropolitan Transportation Authority, since June 2010, has given more than 250,000 Subway Delay Verification notes to passengers to excuse their tardiness; MTA says though version of program has existed for decades, requests have nearly tripled since service first became available online in 2010.
lead_paragraph: Since June 2010, the Metropolitan Transportation Authority has given more than 250,000 Subway Delay Verification notes to passengers to excuse their tardiness.

headline.main: Delayed Train? Skeptical Boss? M.T.A. Will Give Passengers a Late Note
headline.print_headline: Late Train? Skeptical Boss? M.T.A. Will Give Passengers a Note
